hero.headline:
Different clinics.
Same structural challenges.
hero.subheadline:
AberoAI delivers system-level solutions that reduce human pressure
and stabilize communication across global clinic operations.
hero.body:
Whether your clinic handles international patients,
multiple languages, high message volume, or complex aftercare —
the challenges are structural, not personal.

AberoAI resolves them by restructuring communication at the system level.

page1.headline: Global Patient Communication
page1.body:
Problem:
Patients from different countries, languages, and time zones create uneven communication load.

AberoAI Solution:
Multilingual, time-zone-aware communication that stays stable across the journey.

• Multilingual intelligence
• Time-zone stitching
• Consistent clinical tone across languages
• Clear routing for global inquiries
• Cross-border continuity
page1.microline: Your clinic communicates consistently — regardless of origin, language, or hour.

page2.headline: SHIFT & TEAM CONTINUITY
page2.body:
Problem:
Context breaks when shifts change, team members rotate, or departments overlap.

AberoAI Solution:
A continuity engine that preserves context beyond people and time.

• Shift handover stability
• Memory layer stitching
• Context vault
• Identity resolution
• Multi-staff coordination
page2.microline: Operations stay continuous, even when staffing doesn’t

page3.headline: AFTERCARE & LONG-TERM FOLLOW-UP
page3.body:
Problem:
Aftercare often fades after the procedure, leading to trust leakage and lower retention.

AberoAI Solution:
Long-term patient stability — automated, multilingual, and structured.

• Aftercare workflows
• Safety check sequences
• Emotional reassurance cadence
• Long-term touchpoints
• Retention mapping
page3.microline:
Patients feel supported for months —
without adding burden to your team

page4.headline: INBOX CONTROL & OPERATIONAL CLARITY
page4.body:
Problem:
Multiple channels create scattered communication, lost messages, and operational chaos.

AberoAI Solution:
A unified, governed flow that organizes communication by logic — not manpower.

• Multi-channel consolidation
• Unified patient flow
• Predictive signal surfacing
• Issue prediction
• Clean operational visibility

page5.headline:
ROUTING &
PRE-QUALIFICATION
page5.body:
Problem:
Not every inquiry should go to the same person.
Teams lose hours answering non-relevant messages.

AberoAI Solution:
A governed routing layer that distributes messages by logic, not workload.

• Language routing
• Case-based routing
• Department mapping
• Time-zone-aware distribution
• Pre-qualification flows
page5.microline:
Your team speaks only to the right patients —
at the right time

page6.headline: SCALING COMMUNICATION WITHOUT SCALING PRESSURE
page6.body:
Problem:
More patients = more messages = more pressure.

AberoAI Solution:
A structural communication foundation that absorbs volume without increasing human load.

• Automated day-by-day journeys
• Guided replies
• Context-retaining memory
• Noise-reduction logic
• Operational calm layer

page7.headline:
The problems clinics face are systemic.
The solutions must be systemic too.
page7.body:
It restructures communication at its foundation —
turning pressure-driven workflows into governed, predictable operations.
